there. There was an inn in the village which the of- ficers frequented. Rost6v rode up to it and saw Telyan in's horse at the porch. 
In the second room of the inn the lieuten- ant was sitting over a dish of sausages and a bottle of wine. 
"Ah, you've come here too, young man!" he said, smiling and raising his eyebrows. 
"Yes," said Rost6v as if it cost him a great deal to utter the word; and he sat down at the nearest table.
